Title: City of Magic
ShortDescription: It was summer and a Ramadan morning and Shafkat was on a dragon. Normally that'd be bad enough with the sun and sweat and the dragon intermittently breathing fire in its wake for no apparent reason. However his ride also lacked the canopy the government insisted every dragon had to have, exposing Shafkat and his fellow travellers to the elements. This was a major problem because the seats also lacked the harness straps designed to stop people falling off and into the ground. Presumably these had all been sold off to feed the dragon-driver's large sunglass habit.
